dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.loc.PlacePartyRoleAssoc
dataStructure.description:
This is an example of an association linking Place to another part of the SID model.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: PlacePartyRoleAssoc

child.name: validFor
child.description:
the time period that the Identity is valid for

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: placeRole
child.description:
the role that the place plays in the association

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: placeRole

child.name: relativeModifier
child.description:
if the association is relative to the location (not at it) then use a modifier NEAR-TO or OUTSIDE or ACROSS-ROAD-FROM ?

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: relativeModifier
